title: Comparative Prime Number Theory Problem List
authors: Alia Hamieh, Habiba Kadiri, Greg Martin, Nathan Ng
abstract:
This is a list of problems that were collected from participants at the
Comparative Prime Number Theory Symposium held at UBC from June 17 to June 21,
2024. Its goal is to stimulate research and future collaborations in this
growing field. This event was part of the PIMS (Pacific Institute of
Mathematical Sciences) Collaborative Research Group L-functions in Analytic
Number Theory: 2022- 2025.
